short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses OpenAI's GPT4 API to create image alt text when none is available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin uses OpenAI's Vision API to create descriptive text for any image. 
To use it, focus on an image with your screen reader and press Alt+I.
